events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position. The resume shows strong experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster due to the candidate's background in software development and DevOps skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, with positive feedback on the candidate's technical knowledge and communication skills.
The candidate responded promptly to scheduling requests and expressed enthusiasm about the engineering role and company culture.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team lead next week to assess coding skills and problem-solving.
